import React from 'react' import { Col, Row, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Product from '../products' const ProductDetails = ({ match }) => { const params = useParams() const product = Product.find((p) => p._id === params.id) return ( <>

{product.name}

{` $ ${product.price}`}
{product.description}
 ) } export default ProductDetails
